title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 650.1 - Requirements applicable to payphones
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 650.1 - Requirements applicable to payphones

State Regulations
A provider of telephone service to end users by means of a
currency or credit operated telephone, hereinafter a "payphone," shall be
subject to the requirements set forth in this Part. The term "COCOT," as
defined in Public Service Law, sections 90 and 92-c, shall be used
interchangeably with the term payphone. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
650.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
